sentences.en: 'It is always as the good patriot says,'observed the functionary.
sentences.cn: “ 这位好心的爱国者说的话总是对的, ” 那官员说.

sentences.en: As a boy he was a fanatical patriot.
sentences.cn: 年少时，他是个狂热的爱国者。

sentences.en: He was an ardent, though not uncritical patriot.
sentences.cn: 他是一位强烈的爱国者, 虽然并非无懈可击.

sentences.en: He was represented as a true patriot.
sentences.cn: 他被描绘成真正的爱国主义者.

sentences.en: How could Congress pass this Patriot Act without even reading it?
sentences.cn: 国会怎么可能连一项法案看都没看过就通过了 呢 ?

sentences.en: It has been suggested the founders were not true patriots but men out to protect their own interests.
sentences.cn: 有人指出创建者并非真正的爱国者，而是一些维护自己利益的人。

sentences.en: It is a hard time to be an economic patriot.
sentences.cn: 经济爱国主义者的路会变得异常艰难.

sentences.en: Mr. Solicitor - General then, following his leader's lead, examined the patriot : John Barsad, gentleman, by name.
sentences.cn: 副检察长先生于是跟随他上司的榜样询问了爱国志士: 此人是约翰-巴萨先生.

sentences.en: Nobody who considers himself a patriot fights with fear.
sentences.cn: 爱国的人对战斗无所畏惧.

sentences.en: Online , this soft - spoken art instructor becomes a hard - line patriot.
sentences.cn: 这位说话温和的艺术讲师在网上却是一位态度强硬的爱国者.

sentences.en: Patriot broadcasters are aware that mind control is happening.
sentences.cn: 爱国者广播者们意识到精神控制正在发生.

sentences.en: The patriot's voice trembled from the fervo ( u ) r of his emotion.
sentences.cn: 这位爱国者由于感情 激昂 而声音发抖.

sentences.en: To effect objects so dear to every patriot I shall devote myself with anxious solicitude.
sentences.cn: 为达成每个爱国者的宿愿,我将迫不及待地全力以赴.

sentences.en: When toned down again , the unimpeachable patriot appeared in the witness - box.
sentences.cn: 这阵喧哗过去, 那无懈可击的爱国志士已经登上了证人席.

words.tran_cn: 爱国主义；爱国心，爱国精神
